body: I want know how I can be moderator, because I am often online in forum and I am nice to everybody on the server. What must I do more to be moderator?
body_tagged: I want know how I can be moderator, because I am often online in forum and I am nice to everybody on the server. What must I do more to be moderator?
title: How to be moderator

replies.body: From my experience: Don't be inactive on slack or immature on the forums, show dedication and be up to the Senior Staff standards.
replies.body_tagged: From my experience: Don't be inactive on slack or immature on the forums, show dedication and be up to the Senior Staff standards.

replies.body:
Hello!

To apply for moderator read the following thread and create a thread in the Staff Applications subforum before January 1st: https://avicus.net/forums/2b7372798

Also, there is a Question and Answer thread you may be interested in reading as well: https://avicus.net/forums/aaaed8b1c

Good luck!
